update t_project set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, demand = #{demand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, highlights = #{highlights,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_one = #{lastOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_two = #{lastTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, industry_name = #{industryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, financing_limit = #{financingLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, financing_limit_name = #{financingLimitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stage_name = #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_link = #{videoLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_ly = #{videoLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_link = #{proLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bp = #{bp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bp_name = #{bpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, percent = #{percent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, referee = #{referee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_investment = #{lastInvestment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_stage = #{lastStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_limit = #{lastLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_case = #{isCase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, focus = #{focus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, onepage = #{onepage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tb_a.id, tb_a.title,tb_a.demand,tb_a.logo FROM t_project tb_a INNER JOIN t_project_follow tb_b ON tb_a.id = tb_b.projectid where tb_b.userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER by tb_b.create_time DESC limit #{startRow,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(tb_a.id) FROM t_project tb_a INNER JOIN t_project_follow tb_b ON tb_a.id = tb_b.projectid where tb_b.userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select tb_a.id, tb_a.title,tb_a.demand,tb_a.logo FROM t_project tb_a INNER JOIN t_project_adviser tb_b ON tb_a.id = tb_b.projectid where tb_b.userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER by tb_b.create_time DESC limit #{startRow,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(tb_a.id) FROM t_project tb_a INNER JOIN t_project_adviser tb_b ON tb_a.id = tb_b.projectid where tb_b.userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t1.*,t4.id as goodsid,t4.title as goods_name FROM t_project t1 INNER JOIN t_order t2 ON t1.id=t2.projectid INNER JOIN t_order_detail t3 ON t2.id=t3.orderid INNER JOIN t_goods t4 ON t3.goodsid=t4.id ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC limit #{startRow,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_project t1 INNER JOIN t_order t2 ON t1.id=t2.projectid INNER JOIN t_order_detail t3 ON t2.id=t3.orderid INNER JOIN t_goods t4 ON t3.goodsid=t4.id limit #{startRow,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id,logo,title,highlights,demand from t_project where recommend = 1 ORDER by create_time DESC limit 0,#{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id,logo,title,highlights,demand from t_project where is_case = 1 ORDER by create_time DESC limit 0,#{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}
